events.name: South Korea Increases Humanitarian Aid to Ukraine
events.wd_label: South Korea Increases Humanitarian Aid to Ukraine
events.wd_description: South Korean President Yoon Suk-Yeol has promised to increase humanitarian and non-lethal military assistance to Ukraine following a summit with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy.
events.description: South Korean President Yoon Suk-Yeol has promised to increase humanitarian and non-lethal military assistance to Ukraine following a summit with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy.

events.name: Humanitarian Aid Commitment
events.wd_description: South Korea will increase its humanitarian aid to Ukraine to $150 million in 2023.
events.description: South Korea will increase its humanitarian aid to Ukraine to $150 million in 2023.

events.name: Non-Lethal Military Assistance
events.wd_description: South Korea will provide additional non-lethal military assistance to Ukraine, including vehicles and demining equipment.
events.description: South Korea will provide additional non-lethal military assistance to Ukraine, including vehicles and demining equipment.

events.name: Visit to Ukraine
events.wd_description: President Yoon Suk-Yeol and his wife, Kim Keon-Hee, visited Ukraine after attending the NATO summit in Lithuania, marking Yoon's first visit to Ukraine since the Russian invasion.
events.description: President Yoon Suk-Yeol and his wife, Kim Keon-Hee, visited Ukraine after attending the NATO summit in Lithuania, marking Yoon's first visit to Ukraine since the Russian invasion.

events.name: South Korea's Policy on Lethal Weapons
events.wd_label: South Korea's Policy on Lethal Weapons
events.wd_description: South Korea maintains a policy of not supplying lethal weapons to active conflict zones, despite being the world’s ninth-largest arms exporter.
events.description: South Korea maintains a policy of not supplying lethal weapons to active conflict zones, despite being the world’s ninth-largest arms exporter.

events.name: China's Economic Expansion in Q2 2023
events.wd_description: China's economy expanded by 6.3% in the second quarter of 2023 compared to the previous year, driven by a low base from last year's COVID-19 lockdowns.
events.description: China's economy expanded by 6.3% in the second quarter of 2023 compared to the previous year, driven by a low base from last year's COVID-19 lockdowns.

events.name: GDP Growth
events.wd_description: China's gross domestic product grew by 6.3% year-on-year in Q2 2023, with a quarterly growth of 0.8% from April to June.
events.description: China's gross domestic product grew by 6.3% year-on-year in Q2 2023, with a quarterly growth of 0.8% from April to June.

events.name: Industrial Output Increase
events.wd_description: In June, China's industrial output expanded by 4.4%.
events.description: In June, China's industrial output expanded by 4.4%.

events.name: Fixed Asset Investment Rise
events.wd_description: Fixed asset investment in China rose by 3.8% in June.
events.description: Fixed asset investment in China rose by 3.8% in June.

events.name: Record High Youth Unemployment
events.wd_description: The jobless rate for Chinese youth aged 16 to 24 reached a new record high of 21.34% in June, surpassing the previous record of 20.8% set in May.
events.description: The jobless rate for Chinese youth aged 16 to 24 reached a new record high of 21.34% in June, surpassing the previous record of 20.8% set in May.

events.name: North Korea Fires Suspected ICBM
events.wd_description: North Korea fired a suspected intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) that landed in Japanese waters, prompting increased joint military drills by the United States and South Korea.
events.description: North Korea fired a suspected intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) that landed in Japanese waters, prompting increased joint military drills by the United States and South Korea.

events.name: Missile Launch Details
events.wd_description: The suspected ICBM launched by North Korea flew for over one hour before landing in Japanese waters on Wednesday morning.
events.description: The suspected ICBM launched by North Korea flew for over one hour before landing in Japanese waters on Wednesday morning.

events.name: Response by the United States and South Korea
events.wd_label: Response by the United States and South Korea
events.wd_description: The United States and South Korea increased their joint military drills around the Korean peninsula in response to North Korea's missile launch.
events.description: The United States and South Korea increased their joint military drills around the Korean peninsula in response to North Korea's missile launch.

events.name: Emergency Meeting by South Korea
events.wd_description: South Korean President Yoon Suk-Yeol convened an emergency meeting of his national security council while attending the NATO summit in Lithuania.
events.description: South Korean President Yoon Suk-Yeol convened an emergency meeting of his national security council while attending the NATO summit in Lithuania.

events.name: Investment in Quebec Cathode Manufacturing Facility
events.wd_label: Investment in Quebec Cathode Manufacturing Facility
events.wd_description: SK On, EcoProBM, and Ford announce an investment of C$1.2 billion to build a cathode manufacturing facility in Bécancour, Quebec, aimed at supplying materials for Ford’s future electric vehicles.
events.description: SK On, EcoProBM, and Ford announce an investment of C$1.2 billion to build a cathode manufacturing facility in Bécancour, Quebec, aimed at supplying materials for Ford’s future electric vehicles.

events.name: Facility Construction
events.wd_description: Construction has begun on the 280,000 square-meter site, which will include a six-floor building and aims to start production in the first half of 2026.
events.description: Construction has begun on the 280,000 square-meter site, which will include a six-floor building and aims to start production in the first half of 2026.

events.name: Production Capacity
events.wd_description: Once operational, the facility will have the capacity to produce up to 45,000 tonnes of cathode active materials (CAM) per year.
events.description: Once operational, the facility will have the capacity to produce up to 45,000 tonnes of cathode active materials (CAM) per year.

events.name: Local Job Creation
events.wd_description: The new facility will create approximately 345 new jobs in Quebec, including positions for engineers, sales and service professionals, and co-op students.
events.description: The new facility will create approximately 345 new jobs in Quebec, including positions for engineers, sales and service professionals, and co-op students.

events.name: Research and Development
events.wd_description: EcoPro CAM Canada LP will conduct R&D activities to enhance battery safety and performance while minimizing the environmental footprint of its manufacturing process.
events.description: EcoPro CAM Canada LP will conduct R&D activities to enhance battery safety and performance while minimizing the environmental footprint of its manufacturing process.

events.name: Strategic Importance of North America
events.wd_description: The investment aligns with SK On’s growth strategy in North America, aiming to secure a stable supply of key battery materials and lead the region’s transition to electric vehicles.
events.description: The investment aligns with SK On’s growth strategy in North America, aiming to secure a stable supply of key battery materials and lead the region’s transition to electric vehicles.

events.name: North American Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: The cathode JV will help secure a stable supply of battery raw materials in North America, supporting the growing demand for EVs.
events.description: The cathode JV will help secure a stable supply of battery raw materials in North America, supporting the growing demand for EVs.

events.name: SK On’s Expansion Plans
events.wd_description: SK On is actively developing its battery supply chain in North America, with plans to increase its annual production capacity in the region to over 180 GWh after 2025.
events.description: SK On is actively developing its battery supply chain in North America, with plans to increase its annual production capacity in the region to over 180 GWh after 2025.

events.name: EcoProBM’s Global Expansion
events.wd_description: The investment in Quebec marks EcoProBM’s entry into the North American market, following its expansion in Hungary.
events.description: The investment in Quebec marks EcoProBM’s entry into the North American market, following its expansion in Hungary.

events.name: Cathode Material Production
events.wd_description: EcoProBM aims to mass-produce and supply 45,000 tonnes of cathode materials annually, supporting the production of up to 225,000 electric vehicles.
events.description: EcoProBM aims to mass-produce and supply 45,000 tonnes of cathode materials annually, supporting the production of up to 225,000 electric vehicles.

events.name: Contribution to Local Economy
events.wd_description: EcoProBM’s presence in Quebec will contribute to the local economy by creating jobs and supporting regional development.
events.description: EcoProBM’s presence in Quebec will contribute to the local economy by creating jobs and supporting regional development.

events.name: Collaboration with Canadian Government
events.wd_description: Support from the federal and provincial governments was crucial in securing the joint investment for Canada and Quebec.
events.description: Support from the federal and provincial governments was crucial in securing the joint investment for Canada and Quebec.

events.name: Federal Support
events.wd_description: The Canadian federal government provided vital support to attract the investment, positioning Quebec as a key hub in the EV supply chain.
events.description: The Canadian federal government provided vital support to attract the investment, positioning Quebec as a key hub in the EV supply chain.

events.name: Provincial Support
events.wd_description: The Quebec provincial government played a significant role in facilitating the investment, highlighting the region’s leadership in the green economy.
events.description: The Quebec provincial government played a significant role in facilitating the investment, highlighting the region’s leadership in the green economy.
